attributes.action: Introduce free eye wear for people with eye conditions
attributes.additional_details:
For to long people with eye conditions have had to pay for eye wear abd eye tests which shouldn't be a thing 

People with eye conditions suffer everytime by spending to much money on eye wear for something that they can't control 

Coming from someone who cannot see without glasses this hits massively financially and the government and parliament should look into this as a matter of urgency
attributes.background: I want the government to impose free eye wear and eye tests for people born with eye conditions

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition: "Fund free/discounted glasses & lenses for those who need them daily" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/741376
